project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line application that retrieves current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (e.g., requests)
Implement the feature to fetch current weather data from a public API
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the feature to display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API fetching and parsing functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure all functionalities work correctly
